properties.entry: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_ODR ( ORDER_NO , ORDER_QTY , ORDER_PRICE , USER_NO , TOTAL_PRICE , ORDER_ENROLL , GIFT_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_ODR_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , 'N' )

SELECT O.* FROM (SELECT USER_NO , ORDER_NO , TOTAL_PRICE , ORDER_ENROLL , GIFT_YN , ORDER_QTY , ORDER_PRICE , EMAIL , PHONE FROM PRODUCT_ODR JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC)O WHERE ROWNUM=1
